Name: Colonel's Big Opu
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and serve with straws.
Review: A long, fruity yet dry drink charged with champagne.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Victor J. Bergeron's and taken from his Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition) , where he writes "This is one of our old drinks. The colonel's big opu: the colonel's big belly."
Nutrition: One serving of Colonel's Big Opu contains 137 calories
